overview: Erik hires a sexy teen masseuse for his wife Ava. Ava enjoys it so much that she decides to give Casey a little bit of loving in return.  Cherie wants to surprise her husband Ramon for his birthday so she hires Mischa to give him the best gift ever.  Leilani is renting a room in Danas house and keeps breaking all the rules. Dana finally snaps and decides to teach her a lesson about respect.  Will gets his assistant Maddy to go out and buy some sexy lingerie for his wife India. But when India gets home she finds something different.
title: Couples Seeking Teens 14
